EXAMPLE 1
```{r}
n=10
alpha=0.05
lambda=2
k=seq(0,50,1)
p=ppois(k,20,lower.tail=F)
cbind(k,p)
#k=28
l=(0.05-ppois(28,20,lower.tail=F))/dpois(28,20)
l
cat("the value for k:",k,"and gamma is",l)

power=ppois(28,40,lower.tail=F)+0.8633004*dpois(28,40)
power
set.seed(1)
x=rpois(10,2)
sum(x)
```
